problems.title: Sum of First N Natural Numbers
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. Your task is to compute the sum of the first N natural numbers (1 + 2 + ... + N).

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the sum of the first N natural numbers.
hintsList: Use the formula: sum = n * (n + 1) / 2. Be careful with integer overflow in languages that don't support 64-bit integers.
